author: sky.cactus
content:
<@552133098075193354> Putting my EIP editor hat on: only 1559's current authors can make that change.
Putting on my EIP-1559 champion hat on, I would love to see some authors added who are more involved so we can keep things moving forward.

author: timbeiko
content: So, for the authors: <@!273808422753796097> <@!376568077950910466> and <@!332923501079953409> are all here. Could either of you do that? The author to be added is <@!574864862338088960> , a.k.a. `[Abdelhamid Bakhta](https://github.com/abdelhamidbakhta)` in the EIP.
